content: Hello, I'm working on a prototype that requires mapping of HL7 message components to standard FHIR resources. I was looking to map PV17 & PV117 to an appropriate FHIR resource property. Currently, I'm treating both as 'EpisodeOfCare.careManager.Practitioner.name'. I would like these two components to be referenced by two different FHIR resource properties. Any suggestions?
There is a stream dedicated to V2 to FHIR mapping: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179188-v2-to.20FHIR
